mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(SUM(ITEM_QTY)) FROM ITEM GROUP BY ITEM_PRODUCT_CODE

SELECT ITEM_PRODUCT_CODE ,PRODUCT_NAME ,ITEM_QTY FROM ( SELECT II.II_PRODUCT_CODE AS ITEM_PRODUCT_CODE ,P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME ,II.II_QTY - OI.OI_QTY AS ITEM_QTY ,ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT II_PRODUCT_CODE ,SUM(II_QTY) AS II_QTY FROM IN_ITEM
II_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{startDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY II_PRODUCT_CODE ) II INNER JOIN ( SELECT OI_PRODUCT_CODE ,SUM(OI_QTY) AS OI_QTY FROM OUT_ITEM
OI_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{startDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY OI_PRODUCT_CODE ) OI ON II.II_PRODUCT_CODE = OI.OI_PRODUCT_CODE INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_CODE = II.II_PRODUCT_CODE
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(II PK_II_INDEX) */ II.II_PRODUCT_CODE AS II_PRODUCT_CODE ,P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME ,II.II_QTY AS II_QTY ,II.II_DATE AS II_DATE FROM IN_ITEM II INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON II.II_PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND II.II_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{startDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(O PK_OI_INDEX) */ OI.OI_PRODUCT_CODE AS OI_PRODUCT_CODE ,P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME ,OI.OI_QTY AS OI_QTY ,OI.OI_DATE AS OI_DATE FROM OUT_ITEM OI INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON OI.OI_PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND OI.OI_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{startDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT T.PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE ,T.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME ,T.TOTAL_QTY AS TOTAL_QTY ,B.BEFORE_QTY AS BEFORE_QTY ,I.IN_QTY AS IN_QTY ,O.OUT_QTY AS OUT_QTY FROM ( SELECT II.II_PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE ,P.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME ,II.II_QTY - OI.OI_QTY AS TOTAL_QTY
FROM ( SELECT II_PRODUCT_CODE ,SUM(II_QTY) AS II_QTY FROM IN_ITEM
II_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY II_PRODUCT_CODE ) II INNER JOIN ( SELECT OI_PRODUCT_CODE ,SUM(OI_QTY) AS OI_QTY FROM OUT_ITEM
OI_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY OI_PRODUCT_CODE ) OI ON II.II_PRODUCT_CODE = OI.OI_PRODUCT_CODE INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_CODE = II.II_PRODUCT_CODE
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
) T INNER JOIN ( SELECT II.II_PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE ,II.II_QTY - OI.OI_QTY AS BEFORE_QTY FROM ( SELECT II_PRODUCT_CODE ,SUM(II_QTY) AS II_QTY FROM IN_ITEM
II_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY II_PRODUCT_CODE ) II INNER JOIN ( SELECT OI_PRODUCT_CODE ,SUM(OI_QTY) AS OI_QTY FROM OUT_ITEM
OI_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY OI_PRODUCT_CODE ) OI ON II.II_PRODUCT_CODE = OI.OI_PRODUCT_CODE INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_CODE = II.II_PRODUCT_CODE
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
) B ON T.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PRODUCT_CODE INNER JOIN ( SELECT I.II_PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE ,SUM(II_QTY) AS IN_QTY FROM IN_ITEM I INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON I.II_PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND I.II_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}||' 0:0:0','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY I.II_PRODUCT_CODE ) I ON T.PRODUCT_CODE = I.PRODUCT_CODE INNER JOIN ( SELECT O.OI_PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE ,SUM(O.OI_QTY) AS OUT_QTY FROM OUT_ITEM O INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.OI_PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE
P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND O.OI_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}||' 0:0:0','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}||' 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
GROUP BY O.OI_PRODUCT_CODE ) O ON T.PRODUCT_CODE = O.PRODUCT_CODE
